result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel A. Franck was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: GFE to maintain full time employment or schooling.  When not fully engaged, must complete 15 hours community service per week.

Absolute sobriety from alcohol.  

Contact with C.B. at the agent's discretion.

SAFE program.  Counseling as recommended. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Case Called: 8:53 am
Includes 14CM2196 and 15CM387.
Clerk: Kassidi.
Defendant Daniel A. Franck in court with attorney James R. Kurszewski. ADA Molly Lawrence appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
14CM2196:
Ct. 1 (Intimidate Victim/Dissuade Complaints-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.

PLEA: 
15CM387:
Ct. 1 (DC-Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  
OTR: 9:11 am
BOTR: 9:17 am

COURT ORDERS: 
Ct. 1 (DC-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 1 year probation. CONDITIONS: SAFE program, Absolute sobriety from alcohol, AODA and follow up, counseling as recommended, Good faith effort to maintain Full time work/Full time school and when not fully engaged must complete 15 hours Community Service a week, Contact with C.B. at the agent's discretion, Court Costs.

Ct. 2 (BJ--Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 1 year probation. CONDITIONS: SAFE program, Absolute sobriety from alcohol, AODA and follow up, counseling as recommended, Good faith effort to maintain Full time work/Full time school and when not fully engaged must complete 15 hours Community Service a week, Contact with C.B. at the agent's discretion, Court Costs.

Adjourned: 9:19 am
Status conference on March 18, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
and Demand for Discovery and Inspection
Shall not consume alcohol.   No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents.
